lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert, one of our oldest and dearest friends, left us on January 31, 2014. He was a true gentleman and a genuine human being. We cherish all the years of laughs, fun and great experiences our two families had together. Our deepest condolences to Betsy, Nancy, Ned and all the family. Marion, Jerry, Jodi and Andrew Sussman
